title: Head Shaking Vertically

adjectives: Used to express positive or agreeing emotions.
verbs: Represents nodding the head up and down to indicate 'yes'.
nouns: Symbol of affirmation, agreement, or approval.

description: A smiling face nodding its head up and down to say 'yes'. Often used to express agreement, affirmation, or positive acknowledgment.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the head shaking vertically emoji depicts a smiling face gently moving up and down, conveying a clear 'yes' gesture.
